name: AFunctionalAITestBase
doc:
AFunctionalAITestBase

Base abstract class defining a Functional AI Test.
You can derive from this base class to create a test with a different type of SpawnSets.

OnAISpawned: Called when a single AI finished spawning
OnAllAISPawned: Called when a all AI finished spawning
NavMeshDebugOrigin: navmesh debug: log navoctree modifiers around this point
bWaitForNavMesh: if set, ftest will postpone start until navmesh is fully generated
bDebugNavMeshOnTimeout: if set, ftest will postpone start until navmesh is fully generated
